metadata.title: CVE-2018-20683 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: commands/rsync in Gitolite before 3.6.11, if .gitolite.rc enables rsync,mishandles the rsync command line, which allows attackers to have a "bad"impact by triggering use of an option other than -v, -n, -q, or -P.

criterions.comment: gitolite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
